trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGZC106_05076_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Bagnobrok is on the lookout for a widewalking adventurer.
TEXT_KINGZC106_05076_TODO_00<tab>Deliver the pungent pellets to Swipostik.
TEXT_KINGZC106_05076_BAGNOBROK_000_000<tab>Pfff... pfffkohhh... You are an adventurer, are you not? One who widewalks from place to place?
TEXT_KINGZC106_05076_BAGNOBROK_000_001<tab>If you intend to widewalk to Many Fires, could you give this to mobbiefriend Swipostik? Bagnobrok forgot to overhand it last time he visited.
TEXT_KINGZC106_05076_BAGNOBROK_000_002<tab>Naturally, your service shall receive its just reward. Just one warnyword: do not hold noseclose! Very stinkystuff!
TEXT_KINGZC106_05076_BAGNOBROK_000_003<tab>...What is the stinkystuff? It is better you don't know. Don't want to spoil Swipostik's surprise!
TEXT_KINGZC106_05076_SWIPOSTIK_000_004<tab>Pfffkohhh... A present from Bagnobrok, you say? I wonder what it could be...
TEXT_KINGZC106_05076_SWIPOSTIK_000_005<tab>Ah, what an uncredible aroma! Surewise, this is...yes, it is! The most farfamed of fancytastes that nomobbie can resist!

TEXT_KINGZC106_05076_SWIPOSTIK_000_006<tab>Why so wideeyes, adventurer? Did Bagnobrok not tell you what the present is? Swipostik could tell, but it would be better coming from Bagnobrok's wordhole. You should ask him!
TEXT_KINGZC106_05076_SWIPOSTIK_000_007<tab>No, adventurer, no! Swipostik will never lipslip Bagnobrok's secret!
TEXT_KINGZC106_05076_BAGNOBROK_000_008<tab>You gave the present to Swipostik? Manythanks. Swipostik was very happyfeels about it, Bagnobrok trusts?

TEXT_KINGZC106_05076_BAGNOBROK_000_009<tab>There isn't a Moblin around who doesn't love rot-tea, and Bagnobrok's rot-tea is very lipsmacky indeed. Put a pinch in a pot and boil it up, and the festergas is enough to make anymobbie's mask fill with eyewater!
TEXT_KINGZC106_05076_BAGNOBROK_000_010<tab>Yes, rot-tea of Bagnobrok is very goodstuff. Bagnobrok knows exactly which fingerclippings and backscratchings make for the best brew.

TEXT_KINGZC106_05076_BAGNOBROK_000_011<tab>Pfff? Why so bigeyes, adventurer? Do you want to try rot-tea of Bagnobrok for yourself? Sorry, but he gave it all to Swipostik! You will just have to wait until the next harvest!
